eventName: Out with the Old, In with the New
storyName: Out with the Old, In with the New
storyInfo: After Lin Yühsia returns from Yumen, the Rat King names her his successor. All eyes in Lungmen turn to the slums...

attributes.content: Commissioner, we have people watching all paths in and out of the slums, as you ordered.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Good. Keep watch in shifts around the clock. Not a single musbeast gets in or get out today.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Yes, ma'am.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Are you sure a massive operation like this is a good idea? It might do the exact opposite of what you want.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: It's been two weeks since the Rat King stepped aside and put Miss Lin in charge. The slums have been pretty quiet in the meanwhile.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: But then again, it's been two weeks since we saw anything of the stinking rat.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Do you think it's possible for leadership of the slums to change hands without so much as a peep?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Skinny Cheung, Savant Lee, Ghost Eye... do you think the kingpins would just sit on their hands after the Rat King kept them in check for so many years?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Skinny Cheung abducted one of the stinking rat's people today. She's bound to make a move.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: ...I bet Miss Lin can handle it.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I don't need her to handle it. The slums are part of Lungmen.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: That's true. I'm with you on that.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Keep your eyes open for the people on your end. There's bound to be movement there.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: On it.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You just wait, you stupid rat.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Most people go to the bar to drink and dance. I go to the bar to have hotpot, uncultured man that I am.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Mr. Lin, the Dai Lo, used to frequent this place, eating and drinking with our gang.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Too bad it's getting demolished next week. I wanted to have one last dinner here, my way of saying goodbye.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Come, eat up!
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Come now, Wong, why are your chopsticks so still?
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: You had the guts to build a hospital on my turf, but not to have hotpot with me?
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Building the hospital was Miss Lin's idea.
attributes.name: Frightened Merchant

attributes.content: You see? People these days just don't know how things are done.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Miss Lin is the Rat King's heir, she's got her hands full every single day! A legend like her is bound to forget a thing or two.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Underlings like us, our job is to make our boss's job easier, isn't it?
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Am I right, Wong? Now tell me again: was it my dear Yühsia who forgot, or was it you who forgot?
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: I-It was me who forgot.
attributes.name: Frightened Merchant

attributes.content: That's more like it. Even your Miss Lin has to call me uncle when she sees me. She would never do such a thing without running it by me first, would she?
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: It's all a misunderstanding.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: You're shivering, Wong. Are you cold? Seems like your memory isn't so good either.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: You should have some soup from the pot. Eat it while it's hot. It'll do you some good. And then you can deliver my message to dear Yühsia.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: I... I... please, Mr. Cheung... have mercy...
attributes.name: Frightened Merchant

attributes.content: The merchant tries to get out of his chair to kowtow, but a hand presses on his shoulder.
Well, well. Look who it is. If it isn't my dear Yühsia.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: A little advice from your Uncle Cheung, kiddo. You won't achieve anything with such wimpy underlings.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Back in my day, I had to bite a plate to pieces and swallow it in front of a bunch of dai los, just so your dad wouldn't lose face.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Times have changed, Uncle Cheung. Business these days is about win-win.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Wong's wife is in labor. Let him go.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: It's me you're looking for. I'll have some hotpot with you.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Perfect.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: You can go, Wong.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Sorry, Miss Lin.
attributes.name: Frightened Merchant

attributes.content: It's not your fault.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Come, Yühsia, let's eat. Chop chop!
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: You're my elder, Uncle Cheung. If you had something to say to me, you could have told me directly. There's no need for this.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: We've seen what you're capable of these past few years. I supported your dad passing his mantle to you.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Rules are everything in the underworld. Now that you're the one calling the shots, I can't very well treat you like a kid.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: If I may say so, you seem to be treating me like an enemy, rather than like a leader.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You're exaggerating. Without rules, there is only chaos, but we must treat others with courtesy to find our own place.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: You're building on my turf without a single word. You clearly want to undermine me.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: I just had to remind you to not push things too far, lest someone be forced to push back.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: What if I told you I didn't tell you on purpose?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: And they say Yühsia has no sense of humor!
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: I'm not joking, Uncle Cheung.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Do you think you can do anything you want, now that you're a leader?
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: I became the leader to stop certain people from doing anything they want.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Does your dad know about this?
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: As you said, Uncle Cheung, I'm the one calling the shots now.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Looks like I have to help Old Lin teach his daughter a lesson, on his behalf.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Come on, Fat Kwan. We'll have hotpot with my dear Yühsia here.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Grab the guys. Tell them to grab their weapons.
attributes.name: Fat Kwan

attributes.content: Are we really gonna do this? I thought Miss Lin was the new boss.
attributes.name: Fat Kwan's Lackey

attributes.content: A boss is only a boss with the support of the underlings.
attributes.name: Fat Kwan

attributes.content: She's barely been on the job a few days, and she's already going over Cheung's head. Does she think the slums belong to the Lins?
attributes.name: Fat Kwan

attributes.content: B-But she's the Rat King's daughter. What if the Rat King is backing this...?
attributes.name: Fat Kwan's Lackey

attributes.content: You think the Rat King would've needed to go through his daughter if he wanted to do something to Cheung?
attributes.name: Fat Kwan

attributes.content: So... is the Rat King just letting his daughter run amok?
attributes.name: Fat Kwan's Lackey

attributes.content: We all know Miss Lin does things differently from the Rat King.
attributes.name: Fat Kwan

attributes.content: And we all know about her dealings with certain people out in the mainstream.
attributes.name: Fat Kwan

attributes.content: But no one imagined she would go so far as to flout the rules of the slums, the way we've been living for decades.
attributes.name: Fat Kwan

attributes.content: I doubt even the Rat King could have predicted that his daughter would forget where she came from like this.
attributes.name: Fat Kwan

attributes.content: All we're doing is helping the Rat King teach his daughter a lesson. Understand?
attributes.name: Fat Kwan

attributes.content: Got it! I'll get the boys together.
attributes.name: Fat Kwan's Lackey

attributes.content: Looks like you came prepared.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Just sharing the hotpot with the boys. Sharing is caring, as they say.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: It won't be so bad, I promise. I've still gotta answer to your dad, after all.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: You still don't understand, do you, Uncle Cheung? My father isn't involved anymore. How do you expect to answer to him?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You really think he's uninvolved? Just because he says so? How many slum dwellers only listen to him?
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Did you really think you could be the boss without their support?
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: I have my own connections, my own businesses. None of these have anything to do with my father.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Now, now, young lady, a word of advice from your Uncle Cheung.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Young people like you think the old folks like me are behind the times. You want to leave us in the dust. I get it.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Just because you want to leave certain things behind, though, doesn't mean you can.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: If your dad wants to get together for lunch tomorrow, how are we supposed to do that when you step on my toes like this? If Auntie Wong wants to go shopping with your mom, do they have to call it off?
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: You're usually so thoughtful and careful. What's got into you?
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: You put too much stock in favors and relationships, that's all, Uncle Cheung.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You brat...
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: I didn't want to go so far, Yühsia, but it looks like this is going to hurt.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Hey, Lee, it's me.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Make sure about the hospital.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Commissioner Wong? It's me, Lee Man-Heng from Excelsior Construction.
attributes.name: President Lee

attributes.content: Of course I remember. I wouldn't have known something so delicious existed on Terra, if not for you.
attributes.name: Commissioner Wong

attributes.content: I had heard that you were something of a gourmet. Glad to hear it was worth the effort getting those delicacies imported all the way from Rim Billiton.
attributes.name: President Lee

attributes.content: Well, I'm glad to have a friend like you. Anything you need help with, just let me know.
attributes.name: Commissioner Wong

attributes.content: Well, then, if you wouldn't mind... you know about the new hospital in the slums, don't you?
attributes.name: President Lee

attributes.content: Of course. The whole city has eyes on it.
attributes.name: Commissioner Wong

attributes.content: But the bidding is already over, right? A company from the slums won the project, if I recall correctly.
attributes.name: Commissioner Wong

attributes.content: You understand how tough things are for small businesses like us.
attributes.name: President Lee

attributes.content: We had our eyes on this project, but we got cut off by the slum folk.
attributes.name: President Lee

attributes.content: I sympathize, Mr. Lee, but I understand the bidding was won legitimately.
attributes.name: Commissioner Wong

attributes.content: I know, but perhaps you overlooked a few errors in the documents they submitted.
attributes.name: President Lee

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Commissioner Wong

attributes.content: Are you sure about this? A couple of minor problems won't change the outcome.
attributes.name: Commissioner Wong

attributes.content: But there's a possibility that it may affect the outcome, isn't there?
attributes.name: President Lee

attributes.content: I just wanted to give you a heads-up. All you need to do is nod when we submit our complaint.
attributes.name: President Lee

attributes.content: We won't bother you at all with the other stuff.
attributes.name: President Lee

attributes.content: I got some more goodies in from Bolívar. They'll arrive next month. I hope you can join me in the tasting.
attributes.name: President Lee

attributes.content: ...Hah. Sure. No problem.
attributes.name: Commissioner Wong

attributes.content: Now, my dear Yühsia, we can enjoy our hotpot.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: There's no rush.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I have something I wanted to ask, Uncle Cheung.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Sure. I'm happy to answer, as long as it's something I know.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Lungmen takes in vagrants from the barrenlands from time to time. Most of the time, they end up in the slums.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: To prevent their numbers from growing out of control, Chief Wei has signed aid agreements with other countries, in order to allow people to return to their homes.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: But some of them always go missing. Sometimes, they go missing after reaching their destination. Sometimes, the person's not on the list, but they go missing from the slums.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I thought it was a coincidence at first, but as the investigation continued, I realized that someone was engaging in human trafficking, under the guise of aid.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You were nothing if not careful, Uncle Cheung. You find a different buyer each time, and you always sell the people to a number of different places.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: It took me years to finally identify a lead.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Do you recognize the people in these photos, Uncle Cheung?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Lin Yühsia takes out a few photos from her pouch. The people in the photos are thin and emaciated.
No.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: That's what I thought.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Ready?
attributes.name: Fat Kwan

attributes.content: Yeah, the boys are here!
attributes.name: Fat Kwan's Lackey

attributes.content: Who's there?!
attributes.name: Fat Kwan's Lackey

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Fat Kwan's Lackey

attributes.content: This is Cheung's turf! Who the hell are you?!
attributes.name: Fat Kwan

attributes.content: Gah...
attributes.name: Fat Kwan

attributes.content: Wh-Who are you?
attributes.name: Fat Kwan

attributes.content: Come out.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia's Subordinate

attributes.content: Is it him?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia's Subordinate

attributes.content: Yes, that's the one. I'll never forget his voice... he was the one who killed my dad!
attributes.name: Angry Man

attributes.content: I remember him too! I spent a dozen years in the Ursine mines because of him!
attributes.name: Frightened Woman

attributes.content: Yes... yes... I'll remember his tattoo even if he were burned to ashes... he was the one who sold me to Rim Billiton!
attributes.name: Nervous Old Man

attributes.content: He can't move. Miss Lin says you can do anything you want to him.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia's Subordinate

attributes.content: There is a mixture of surprise and anger on the faces of these people when they see Fat Kwan. At the words of Lin Yühsia's lieutenant, a few of them muster the courage to kick Fat Kwan a few times.
Most of them, however, cower behind.
On their faces is the fear that has followed them through all their years abroad.
Ladies and gentlemen, on behalf of Miss Lin, I promise you that your nightmares have come to an end.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia's Subordinate

attributes.content: That's because—
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia's Subordinate

attributes.content: Everybody, freeze!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I hear fighting. What's going on?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Because the L.G.D. is here to help you.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia's Subordinate

attributes.content: You're the stinking rat's lackey?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Commissioner Swire, I hereby report on behalf of Miss Lin the crimes of human trafficking that Cheung Man-Ho, Fat Kwan, and those associated with them have engaged in over the years.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia's Subordinate

attributes.content: We have the witnesses here. As for the evidence...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia's Subordinate

attributes.content: We have that here too.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia's Subordinate

attributes.content: We have faith that you will deliver justice for these people.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia's Subordinate

attributes.content: Ding nei goh fai, the stupid rat had it all planned out, didn't she?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Miss Lin simply—
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia's Subordinate

attributes.content: That's enough. Take Fat Kwan's gang into custody, and bring the witnesses into protection.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You're not going anywhere either, stinking rat gang. You're gonna need to come to the station and make a statement.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Where are you going, commissioner?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: ...I'm in the mood for some hot pot.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You see, Yühsia, there were multiple foreign syndicates trying to take root in the slums.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Your dad is strong, but not invincible. It was no sure bet that he could have established himself here, if I wasn't there to take some of the pressure off him.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: I don't blame you for not understanding the complexities, Yühsia. You weren't born at the time, after all.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Dad said a lot of blood would have been shed in the slums, if you didn't stand up and step forward.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Little did he know that the one appreciated so much was dealing with those foreign syndicates, helping them with their human trafficking business.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I had no choice!
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: There is always a way, if not at the time, then certainly afterward.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: How many of those deeds were done because you had no choice, how many were just you deceiving yourself, and how many were just because you couldn't bring yourself to stop?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You weren't there, Yühsia. Don't talk like you know.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: True, I wasn't there.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: And I prefer it that way.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Did you ever go looking for them, Uncle Cheung? Did you try to help them? Do anything for them?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Have you ever seen them standing despondent before their unrecognizable old homes? Have you ever seen them crying before the graves of their loved ones?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Spare me, Yühsia.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: You think that kind of talk will rattle me?
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Of course not. I'm not that naive.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I just wanted to remind you, in case you forgot.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: But I'm sure you remember the people in this photo.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Lin Yühsia takes out another photo from her pouch.
It is one of Skinny Cheung, President Lee, and Commissioner Wong laughing and drinking together.
A shadow comes over Skinny Cheung's expression.
Lee has left Commissioner Wong's office, sir. What do we do?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Keep an eye on him. I'll go have a chat with Commissioner Wong.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Commissioner Wong

attributes.content: ...Come in.
attributes.name: Commissioner Wong

attributes.content: Commissioner Wong, I am Inspector Hoshiguma, L.G.D. I would like to talk to you.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Good timing, Inspector. I have a report to make...
attributes.name: Commissioner Wong

attributes.content: Correction. I'm surrendering myself.
attributes.name: Commissioner Wong

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I am confessing that I covered up the illegal bidding activities of certain corporations.
attributes.name: Commissioner Wong

attributes.content: I am also reporting that Lee Man-Heng of Excelsior Construction is attempting to illegally influence the bidding result of the new hospital project in the slums.
attributes.name: Commissioner Wong

attributes.content: He was just here. I recorded our conversation.
attributes.name: Commissioner Wong

attributes.content: The one behind him is Cheung Man-Ho of the slums, who has repeatedly influenced project bidding over the years with a mixture of bribery and violence.
attributes.name: Commissioner Wong

attributes.content: I have the evidence.
attributes.name: Commissioner Wong

attributes.content: Who put you up to this?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: No one, Inspector. I'm doing it of my own accord.
attributes.name: Commissioner Wong

attributes.content: Miss Lin.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Wow.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Lee Man-Heng... a familiar name to many inhabitants of the slums.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: His company was responsible for much of the slums' infrastructure. One could even call him the great benefactor of the slums.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: When I was little, Dad told me how Uncle Cheung's friend, Mr. Lee, built all these buildings in the slums. I was very grateful to him.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: It's no exaggeration to say that he was the one who inspired me to build the slums' first public hospital.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: But as I began to study these things and embarked on this path, I started to learn how much investment and aid he embezzled with those government officials whom he was in league with.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Those buildings that I admired so much were built using cheap, inferior materials, allowing him to embezzle millions of dollars through his construction projects.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: The one who cajoled him into taking this path...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Was you, Uncle Cheung.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: He was the one who approached me first. He said there was immense potential here.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Does it matter who was first?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Together, the two of you stole from the many thousands of families who live in the slums, in order to fund your comforts and excesses.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: It's true there are certain things I've kept hidden from your dad over the years.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Some of them I had no choice. The others, though, I must admit I had a choice.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: I do feel guilty towards your dad for those.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: And it makes me feel better now that you've pointed them out, and I can finally admit them to myself.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: But that's all the more reason why I can't let you leave.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Yühsia, but you're going to have to come with me.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Once I'm safe—
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Lee? What is it?
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Help me, Cheung!
attributes.name: President Lee

attributes.content: The L.G.D. just arrested me!
attributes.name: President Lee

attributes.content: What did you say?!
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Cheung? Cheung! Don't hang—
attributes.name: President Lee

attributes.content: ...Ugh.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Fat Kwan's at the station too. You can go see both of them together.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: The communicator has hardly beeped twice before Swire walks in, throwing Fat Kwan's communicator in front of Skinny Cheung.
Is there another call you would like to make, Uncle Cheung?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I can do it for you. Savant Lee, Ghost Eye, Mr. Wong, Mr. Chan...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Lin Yühsia takes out a communicator from her pouch, keeping her eye firmly on Skinny Cheung.
Skinny Cheung does not answer. He leans back in his chair, his hand clutching the communicator tightly. A thousand expressions flash across his face.
It is over.
Finally, he closes his eyes and exhales deeply.
It is as though he has aged ten years.
We all reap what we sow, Uncle Cheung.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: What about your Auntie Wong?
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: I'll tell her personally.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Your son's schooling will not be affected.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I used to think I could stick to my principles, just like you.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: But take one step down the wrong path, and you go astray forever.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: Tell your dad... Cheung Man-Ho is sorry.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: I will.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Take me to Fat Kwan and Lee, Commissioner Swire.
attributes.name: Skinny Cheung

attributes.content: The police car's outside. You need an escort?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Uncle Cheung was good to me when I was little.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: When I was eight, he threw his new, expensive watch into a well, just so I would smile.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You sure were one mean, stupid rat.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I still am.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Don't you dare think you did me a favor. The L.G.D. was already on Skinny Cheung's tail.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Just cleaning house.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Well, well. Look at you, Lin the heroine, eliminating a thorn in the L.G.D.'s side so soon after coming back from Yumen.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You could bring people into the slums without anybody noticing, and even influence the government's treasury department.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: How about I tell Chief Wei to name you the next Commissioner?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Right now, there are certain things that have to be dealt with this way.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: The walls between the slums and Lungmen must be taken down slowly, piece by piece.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You think we'd be standing here talking if I didn't?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: What do you think I surrounded the slums for? Was it to catch you, or to protect you?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You're not dumb enough to think that you have to catch me today. And you're not so nice that you would let me leave if I slipped up.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Good. Don't you forget it.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Lungmen needed the slums in your father's time. That doesn't mean Lungmen always will.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Don't tell me you forgot what we said when we were in school.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: 'Nobody is born to spend their life in the slums. The day will come when those in the slums will see the sun.'
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I've never forgotten. I wonder if a certain someone has, though. She couldn't even keep a promise, after all.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You're one petty woman.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: How long do you intend to keep nagging me about that?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I'm a mean, stupid rat, after all. Why wouldn't I make the most of this one weakness of yours?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Talking to you raises my blood pressure to dangerous levels. I should ask Hoshiguma to get me some medicine.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Anyway, as long as you remember what we said and never forget whom you're fighting for...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: The L.G.D. won't stop you.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Is the Commissioner of the L.G.D. offering immunity to this humble citizen?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Think of it as the Commissioner of the L.G.D. putting restraints on this humble citizen.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Swire takes out a pair of handcuffs.
She puts one cuff around Lin Yühsia's wrist, and the other around her own.
Lin Yühsia does not resist.
Anyway, you've got to come to the station to make a statement.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Pick up your own mess.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'm hungry after running around the slums all day.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Let's have some hotpot!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Put the vegetables in, you stinking rat.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Why me?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I put the handcuffs on my dominant hand.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You're old and you're injured. You shouldn't be climbing high places like this.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Wanted to say goodbye to an old friend. My leg's bad, but the least I could do is pour out some liquor for him.
attributes.name: Lin Kojui

attributes.content: Is it your leg that failed you, or your shame?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Do you remember that headstrong kid who said he wouldn't let anyone touch a single hair on your head or mine, so long as he still breathed?
attributes.name: Lin Kojui

attributes.content: I do.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: He worked under me for thirty years. I gave him a good life for thirty years.
attributes.name: Lin Kojui

attributes.content: I could never imagine he was keeping so much hidden from me.
attributes.name: Lin Kojui

attributes.content: I owe him nothing.
attributes.name: Lin Kojui

attributes.content: But you couldn't bring yourself to do it.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: And you didn't expect your daughter to be so decisive.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The Rat King of the slums, hiding because he's afraid to see his own daughter. What will people think?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I must object.
attributes.name: Lin Kojui

attributes.content: I'm not the Rat King anymore, just an old man with too much time on his hands.
attributes.name: Lin Kojui

attributes.content: I'm happier than anyone else that my daughter is growing up faster than I ever expected.
attributes.name: Lin Kojui

attributes.content: You've let it go.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Of course I have. Even if I didn't want to see her now, we still have to eat at the same table later.
attributes.name: Lin Kojui

attributes.content: That niece of yours, though? You couldn't see her, even if you wanted.
attributes.name: Lin Kojui

attributes.content: You had to bring it up, didn't you?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Nothing has changed. If she decides to come back, Lungmen will be the best backing she could possibly have.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Lin Kojui

attributes.content: We've all grown old, old friend.
attributes.name: Lin Kojui

attributes.content: But I'm not too worried about the young ones we've entrusted Lungmen's future to.
attributes.name: Lin Kojui

attributes.content: You'll grow old even quicker if you say things like that.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Hah hah hah.
attributes.name: Lin Kojui
